title: It Began in Brooklyn
description: Valerie keeps secrets that could turnher life upside down.Valerie Becker, producer and writer of new TV showBrooklyn, is ready to make her big break. Her best friend,Lily Fontaine, portrays her dream role as the main actress and hopes to capture Noah Halls’ attention, her co-star and forever celebrity crush.But Hollywood’s heartthrob takes Valerie by surprise when he falls for her instead, putting her friendship andprofessionalism on the line.The lies and anxiety pile up as their past haunts them and she has to face the challenges of a woman seekingsuccess in the film industry.
author: Flor Tedesco
